scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -f umd -n d3 -o build/d3-jetpack-module.js -- index.js
scripts.premulti: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup --banner "$(preamble)" -f umd -g d3-selection:d3,d3-transition:d3 -n d3 -o build/d3-selection-multi.js -- index.js
scripts.postpublish: zip -j build/d3-jetpack-module.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-jetpack-module.js build/d3-jetpack-module.min.js
